title: What is the interpretation of seeing Eid al-Fitr in a dream in full?

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing Eid al-Fitr in a dream is complete. Eid al-Fitr is one of the Muslim holidays that comes after the end of the blessed month of Ramadan. All the correct and correct interpretations related to the interpretation of Eid congratulations in a dream are complete, and the interpretation of seeing the Eid prayer in a dream is complete, on the lips of leading scholars of interpretation and visions, for married people and pregnant women. And through Jawadah’s website, which specializes in the sciences of jurisprudence and interpretation. What is the interpretation of seeing Eid al-Fitr by Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin narrates about Eid al-Fitr in a dream full of good visions that indicate good deeds. Also, Eid al-Fitr in a complete dream is good news for the dreamer to end his problems and remove His worries and sorrows. Eid al-Fitr is always in a dream, which indicates the enjoyment of a calm, happy, and stable life that the dreamer enjoys. Seeing the entire Eid in a dream means accepting repentance and showing the dreamer’s closeness to God Almighty. A public feast in a prisoner’s dream foretells the end of his suffering and imprisonment, and the enjoyment of freedom soon. See also: Eid al-Fitr in a dream for single women. What is the interpretation of seeing Eid prayers for a common woman in general? Eid in her dream is also a sign of ending her worries, alleviating her pain, and changing for the better in her life. To see holidays in a dream as a whole indicates joy, happiness, and enjoyment of a full future life. With good news, and God knows best. See also: Seeing Eid al-Fitr in a completed dream for a married woman. Seeing Eid al-Fitr in a completed dream for a married woman indicates that good things will happen in it and portends achieving goals. What is the interpretation of seeing the Eid al-Fitr crescent for a married woman as good news that the woman’s desires will be fulfilled? She has been awaited for a long time, and the result of her arrival may almost be pregnancy? And God knows best. Eid in a dream indicates a stable life free of problems and obstacles and the wife’s enjoyment of married life without worry. See also: Seeing Eid al-Fitr in a pregnant woman’s complete dream. Seeing Eid in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the arrival of many good things and food for her next life. It also indicates Celebrating that the pregnant woman’s prayer is accepted by God and relieves her of her worries and anguish, and God knows best. Eid in general in a pregnant woman’s dream shows the ease of childbirth and the earliest date for her birth without trouble and misery, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. What is the interpretation of seeing Eid for a divorced woman? The interpretation of a divorced woman seeing a full Eid in a dream is evidence. To get rid of the problems and difficulties that she suffers from. If a divorced woman sees herself greeting children on Eid al-Fitr, this indicates the disappearance of her worries. Seeing an Eid al-Fitr break in a dream is full of desirable dreams that show kindness and a long and wide life. The interpretation of seeing a greeting in a dream is complete. The presence of a successful person In a dream, congratulating the dreamer on the celebration indicates imminent comfort and the end of problems and worries. Also, congratulations on holidays in general indicate the arrival of joys and happiness and the fulfillment of long-awaited desires and desires. Congratulations on the Eid in a dream full of good visions that indicate a future life full of goodness and pleasure, and God Almighty. See Also: If you have a dream and want to interpret it, write it in a comment below

title: Interpretation of seeing hair removed from the face in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the vision of removing facial hair in a dream or through the vision website roy2a.com. Every woman seeks to get rid of her facial hair as soon as it appears, while being careful to take care of the beauty of her appearance and maintain her appearance. The purity of her skin and the vision of removing facial hair in a dream have different and multiple connotations, and the interpretation varies according to the method of removal, which may be plucking, wax, razor, or other known methods. Interpreters differed in interpreting the vision of facial hair being removed in a dream according to the condition and circumstances of the person who saw it, and whether he was a man or The woman is single, married or pregnant, and today through the vision website. Discuss in detail the interpretation of seeing facial hair in a dream, based on the opinion of major interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is the interpretation of Ibn Sirin who sees facial hair being removed in a dream: Seeing hair being removed in a dream indicates freedom from anxiety, and liberation. Of problems, overcoming crises, and releasing sorrows and worries. Seeing hair removal in a dream indicates spending money on a trade or project through which the viewer will achieve a lot of profits. Seeing hair removal in a dream indicates the kindness and good morals that the divine possesses and shows his obedience and integrity to his parents. Seeing eyebrow hair removed in a dream indicates the dreamer’s desire to appear good in front of others. Seeing yourself plucking facial hair in a dream is an unpleasant vision that warns of bad luck for the dreamer. See also: Interpretation of seeing a hairstyle in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing facial hair removed in a dream for a man: Seeing a man removing his facial hair in a dream indicates the great material losses he will incur. Seeing a man removing a man’s beard in a dream indicates failures and failures in the dreamer’s life, and his distress and sadness. See also: Interpretation of hair loss in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing facial hair removed in a dream for a married woman Seeing a married woman removing her facial hair in a dream: This may indicate that they will be in financial trouble in the coming period. Seeing a married woman removing her facial hair in a dream announces that she will get rid of many of the major problems and fears that she suffers from in her life. Seeing a married woman removing her eyebrow hair in a dream: The dream mentions his good reputation among people. Seeing a married woman plucking her facial hair in a dream may indicate her separation from her husband, either through divorce or death, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of seeing long hair in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing facial hair removed in a dream for a single woman: Seeing in a dream An unmarried woman removing facial hair indicates that her marriage is approaching, God willing. Seeing a dream of a rich single woman removing facial hair indicates that she is spending her money on things that do not benefit her. Seeing a dream of a rich single woman removing facial hair indicates her success at work, improving her financial circumstances, and paying off her debts. Seeing an unmarried woman removing facial hair. A married woman removes eyebrow hair in a dream, which indicates the collapse of problems and crises in her life and the improvement of her psychological state. See also: Interpretation of seeing hair wriggling in a dream. Interpretation of seeing hair removed

title: Interpretation of seeing yourself cutting onions in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing cutting onions in a dream via the vision website Roy2a.com. Seeing cutting onions in a dream indicates fears and problems, and green onions indicate happy news and positive changes. Likewise, green onions are good in a dream and happy news, and we will explain that in detail in this article. Seeing cutting onions in A dream for a married man, a single young man, and an unmarried girl, as well as for a married woman, an interpretation of a dream about cutting onions, and a pregnant woman as well, as for the divorced woman and the widow, and by presenting the interpretations of the great interpreters of visions and dreams, such as Imam Muhammad ibn Sirin in the past, and the scholars of interpretation and visions in the modern era, so follow us on the Roya website. What Interpretation of seeing cutting onions in a dream by Imam Ibn Sirin: Seeing onions in a dream indicates sadness, anxiety, and revealing secrets. Seeing cutting onions indicates a lot of money that you have won. Seeing onions indicates overcoming adversities and difficulties and freedom from distress. Seeing onions for a married woman indicates many problems. As it indicates revealing secrets and scandals. See also: Interpretation of seeing garlic cloves in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing yourself cutting onions in a dream for a single woman: Seeing cutting onions in a dream for a single girl Cue revealing a secret after keeping it for a long time. If a girl sees that she is cutting onions in a dream It indicates hearing happy news. If an unmarried girl sees herself buying onions, it indicates many psychological problems and stress. What is the interpretation of seeing yourself cutting onions in a dream for a married woman: Seeing yourself cutting and cooking onions in a dream for a married woman indicates the stability of her married life and the abundance of blessings. If A married woman sees that she is buying onions. It indicates pregnancy and childbirth in a short period of time. If a married woman sees onions in a dream, it indicates the bad words she hears from neighbors, problems and fights. See also: Interpretation of seeing garlic in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing yourself cutting onions in a dream for a woman? Pregnant: Seeing yourself cutting onions in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates fatigue and pain from the effects of pregnancy and childbirth. If a pregnant woman sees that she is cooking onions, it indicates the approach and ease of childbirth, as well as good health for the mother and the newborn. See also: Interpretation of seeing an image in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing yourself cutting onions in a dream For a divorced woman: Seeing yourself cutting white onions in a divorced dream indicates many troubles and problems and hearing sad news. If a divorced woman sees green onions, it indicates a lot of good and good reputation, as it suggests that she heard good news that changed her life for the better. See also: Interpretation of seeing intercourse in A dream: What is the interpretation of seeing red onions in a dream for a single woman: Seeing red onions in one dream expresses impatience for a better future, the fulfillment of desires and positive changes in a girl’s life. Seeing onions in a dream for a single woman indicates a corrupt man who will propose to her or break off the engagement. Seeing cooked onions In a dream, it indicates a lot of goodness, success, and the fulfillment of desires. What is the interpretation of a dream about green onions: Seeing onions

See also: Interpretation of seeing an image in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing yourself cutting onions in a dream For a divorced woman: Seeing yourself cutting white onions in a divorced dream indicates many troubles and problems and hearing sad news. If a divorced woman sees green onions, it indicates a lot of good and good reputation, as it suggests that she heard good news that changed her life for the better. See also: Interpretation of seeing intercourse in A dream: What is the interpretation of seeing red onions in a dream for a single woman: Seeing red onions in one dream expresses impatience for a better future, the fulfillment of desires and positive changes in a girl’s life. Seeing onions in a dream for a single woman indicates a corrupt man who will propose to her or break off the engagement. Seeing cooked onions In a dream, it indicates a lot of goodness, success, and the fulfillment of desires. What is the interpretation of a dream about green onions: Seeing onions

title: Interpretation of seeing sneezing in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing sneezing in a dream via the website Vision roy2a.com. Seeing sneezing in a dream has many meanings. Seeing it can be a good sign or an evil omen. Interpreters differed in their interpretation of sneezing in a dream depending on the condition and circumstances of the viewer and whether the man or woman is single, married, or pregnant. Based on the opinion of major commentators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Katheer, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is the interpretation of seeing someone sneezing in a dream? Seeing someone sneezing in a dream indicates a long life for the pioneer. Seeing a sick person sneezing in a dream indicates his recovery from this disease, and God knows best. Seeing someone sneezing in a dream indicates a long life for the pioneer. The dream indicates that the dreamer is a religiously sincere person who is close to God and always praises him for his grace and grace. Seeing sneezing in a dream can also indicate that bad things are said about the monarch behind his back. Seeing sneezing in a dream indicates the fortuneteller’s certainty and certainty about something that he suspected for a long time. Seeing a sick person sneezing loudly in a dream indicates ill health, which may lead to his death, and God knows best. Seeing sneezing in a dream also indicates many worries and anxieties in life. The dreamer sees that he sneezed forcefully in a dream. This vision is considered a warning to the monarch to beware of his enemy who is lurking to lure him into a trap. Read also: Interpretation of seeing an apartment in a dream. What is the interpretation of Ibn Shaheen in a dream about him sneezing? Seeing sneezing in a dream indicates the dreamer’s great praise. May God bless his life and the many blessings it brings. Seeing in a dream the person in question sneezing indicates the end of all his problems and worries in the coming period. What is the interpretation of seeing sneezing in a dream for a single woman? Seeing isolated people sneezing in a dream shows that promising things will happen in the near future. Seeing in In a dream, a woman sneezes in front of a well-known man and announces that she will soon marry this man and live with him a life full of happiness and stability. Seeing a single woman sneezing in front of a strange man in a dream announces that in the coming period she will meet a young man and she will love him and he will propose to her. Seeing lonely people with a cold in a dream announces that she will respond in kind. The feeling for the young man who has loved her for a long time. Read also: Interpretation of seeing the opposite in a dream. Sneezing in a dream. Sneezing. Seeing a sneezing person sneezing in a dream states that the dreamer has a strong relationship with the person who is sneezing in the dream and always extends a helping hand to help him. Interpretation of a dream about a cold for a married woman. Seeing a married woman with a cold In a dream, it indicates that he will face serious health problems in the coming days. Seeing a married woman sneezing with a cold in a dream shows that she will be in good health after living for a long time with a difficult illness. Read also: Interpretation of seeing a kangaroo in a dream. We are happy to see the reception of your dream of “seeing a sneeze.” Through comments and the dream team will interpret your dream, respond and communicate with you.

title: Interpretation of a dream about clay in Al-Osaimi’s dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about mud in a dream: Seeing mud in a dream is one of the visions that is considered auspicious, and some scholars have interpreted it as a sign of good and evil, despite the differences in the dreams that the dreamer sees in the dream. By Al-Osaimi. Meanings of seeing mud in a dream Al-Osaimi Al-Osaimi interprets most of the dreams about mud that people see in a dream, and each dream has a meaning or interpretation for it. As the interpretation of cleaning clothes from the mud on them suggests, this means that the dreamer will get rid of the worries, adversities, and problems that often haunt him. Otherwise Whoever sees himself eating clay in a dream, this indicates the abundance of sustenance that he brings to us along with obtaining the benefits he needs in his life. In addition, the meaning of clay used in construction indicates that there will be abundant profit and profit that the dreamer will receive during the dream. Also Seeing clay in the dreamer’s dream without evidence indicates that there is joy, happiness, news, or happy circumstances for the pioneer. Interpretation of Al-Osaimi in a dream of clay in a dream about a man. Dreaming of a man walking in mud during a dream indicates that what he wants, desires, and desires will come true, in addition to This dream indicates that the dreamer is entering a period full of successes and goodness that he enjoys. In addition, when a man sees that children are playing in the mud during the dream, this indicates the intimacy, pleasure, and love that exists in the family or whoever sees him. But if the sick person dreams that he is walking in the mud, this indicates the severe pain and diseases that the patient feels, but it He will be cured of it very soon, and only God knows. Statement of the Meanings of a Single Woman Seeing Mud in a Dream by Al-Osaimi This time, seeing an unmarried woman walking in mud in a dream means that this girl is trying to achieve her desires and is doing everything in her power to achieve success in her life. But if she sees something other than A married woman herself walks in the mud without shoes on her feet. This is one of the good visions for the girl, and this indicates the joy and happiness that will come to her in the coming period for her and not for anyone. He sees it in that dream. If an unmarried woman sees that her shoes are dirty with mud during the dream, this is good news for the girl that happy and enjoyable circumstances will happen to her and to those she sees in the dream. Interpretation of a dream of a married woman stumbling in a dream about Al-Osaimi. One of the warning visions for a married woman is that her face and body Covered in mud during the dream, this alerts her that she is a woman with a bad reputation and that her behavior among people is not good or good. Seeing a married woman with mud in her bed in a dream means treachery, treachery, and slander. Also, dreaming of one’s wife drowning in mud indicates that she is behaving in an inappropriate manner. Or moral, and that it has bad qualities, and is described as non-conformity. Al-Osaimi’s interpretations indicate that seeing a married woman in the mud is bad visions for her and does not bode well. Most of them are a warning sign for a married woman of some bad things that she is doing. Interpretation of seeing clay in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin indicated that cleaning the house of mud means removing the worries and pressures that affect

title: What is the complete interpretation of seeing cherries in a dream?

preview.html: The Trend website offers you a complete interpretation of seeing cherries in a dream, so many people have gathered for you, God, instructions for picking cherries in a complete dream, in addition to testimony about cherries in a complete dream. And visions, as well as seeing cherries in a dream for a married woman, as well as the interpretation of cherries in a dream, are complete for a woman’s bowl. If you are interested in knowing what cherries dream about, then you should read the article. What is the dream of cherries Ibn SirinThe great scholar Ibn Sirin explained that seeing cherries in a dream is a sign of goodness and blessings in the dreamer’s life. In addition, the sight of a cherry tree is evidence that the dreamer lives in luxury and enters into In a life full of happiness and pleasure. Seeing whole cherries in a dream, as a rule, indicates a profit from money, and the dreamer will earn a lot of food in his life. Eating whole cherries in a dream, and they were green in color, means that the dreamer will accumulate great wealth in the next life. To see cherries in a dream - to get rid of worries and problems and bring the dreamer to a period of rest. See also: Why do apricots dream in a full dream? Why do cherries dream of tall women? A single girl eats cherries in her sleep - a harbinger that she will enter a period full of joy and happiness. Also, cherries are in a woman’s dream General evidence of the fulfillment of her desires and goals and achieving the desired goal that she seeks. Seeing whole red cherries in a dream means for an unmarried girl that she will soon marry the one she loves and desires. Seeing cherries in a dream whole and tasting wonderful is evidence that the girl will get rid of all her worries. And her problems in her life. Damaged cherries in a dream is one of the unpleasant visions that indicate illness, anxiety and sadness for the girl. See also: Why does the whole lip dream in a dream? Seeing cherries in a dream full of cherries for a married woman. Whole cherries in a dream for a married woman is evidence of getting rid of the problems she faces with her husband. Eating whole cherries in a dream for a married woman promises her goodness and indicates the accumulation of money and a lot of food in her life. Also, seeing whole cherries in a dream for a married woman and her husband giving them to her is news of the fulfillment of her desires and dreams. Eating rotten cherries in a dream is a sign of illness and the appearance of Many problems in her family life. See also: Why dream of plums? To see plums in a whole dream. Why do you dream of pregnant cherries? The interpretation of seeing whole cherries in a dream for a pregnant woman is one of the praiseworthy visions and indicates that she will give birth to a male child. Seeing whole cherries in a dream means safety And freedom from pregnancy and ease of childbirth, God willing. Eating whole cherries in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates that her health will improve and that she and her fetus will enjoy better health. Picking cherries in a dream completely: To dream that you are picking cherries from a tree means that you will collect money and profit from trade. Picking whole cherries is In a dream, eating it is good news that the dreamer will achieve many desires and goals. preview.html: As for seeing berries in a dream, they have many symbols and meanings, the interpretation of which depends on the condition of the viewer. To know the interpretation of seeing berries according to your situation, complete the rest of the article from your website gptafser.com/.Interpretation of seeing berries in a dream for one girl. Interpretation of seeing berries in a dream for one girl. It is a sign of a happy marriage crowned with love and stability. While if an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is collecting or harvesting berries from the tree. It is evidence of the success that she will achieve, whether in studies if he continues to study or at work if he works. Green time for a single girl In a dream. This means that he achieves great achievements at a young age. But if an unmarried girl sees red berries in a dream. It is a sign of achieving the desires and aspirations that he wanted. Eating red berries for a girl in a dream. Signing marriage to a person of good character who fears and respects her. Interpretation A dream about cranberries is interpreted by one girl in a dream. To meet a brave and courageous man, and if he eats cranberries, he will recover, and perhaps that means that he is a brave character. See also: Interpretation of seeing berries in detail in a dream. Interpretation of seeing berries in a dream for a married woman. A lot of berries in a dream for a married woman in The dream. The meaning of good offspring and a lot of money for the fortuneteller. Eating colored berries in a married woman’s dream. It indicates happiness and stability that will satisfy the dreamer. But if the married woman lives in a state of stability and calm in reality, and she sees that she is buying berries from the market in a dream. She will They will receive blessings in livelihood and more happiness. It was said that we saw berries on a married woman in a dream. On the imminent date of pregnancy if she was waiting for this news. But if she is at an age where she is not fit to have children and she sees berries in large quantities in a married woman’s dream. There are many things The good that the dreamer will enjoy soon. Storing berries in the refrigerator or pantry for a married woman in a dream. This means that she is doing many good deeds in her life. Perhaps this indicates her good upbringing, i.e. improving parenting. Interpretation of seeing berries in a dream for a man Its meaning: When a married man sees berries in a dream, he will gain goodness, sustenance, and blessings in his life. We know that seeing berries in a married man’s dream. It is a sign of righteous offspring belonging to insight, especially if they are exciting and diverse. In the event that the married man is looking for a job or business His income increases in reality and he sees that he is eating berries in a dream. The vision showed that you will have money and a large profit thanks to God Almighty. Buying berries from the market in a married man’s dream. Its sign is goodness and happiness that the dreamer gains, and it may indicate marital happiness. Berries in a married man’s house In a dream. An indication that the dreamer has good religion, good character, and education. Eating cranberries for a married man in a dream indicates that he is a person who is not afraid of anyone and speaks of difficulties. It can also be said that seeing berries in a married man’s dream is a sign of an increase in money. And the Lord

title: Interpretation of a funeral in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a funeral in a dream Seeing a funeral in a dream, interpretation of a stranger’s funeral, seeing a funeral walking after a funeral Interpretation of a dream about the funeral of a living person and the funeral of the dead in a vision Interpretation of a prayer funeral, children’s funeral, seeing a coffin in a dream and interpretation of crying at a funeral In this article we will learn about the interpretation of a funeral In a dream on a different site. Interpretation of a funeral in a dream by Ibn Sirin and al-Nabul. Ibn Sirin said that seeing funerals in the market shows the hypocrisy of the people of the market. Whoever sees a funeral in the air or floating in the air, this indicates the death of an important and foreign person who may be a president or a scholar. As for seeing funerals in a dream It indicates that the people of the countries participating in the funerals have committed immoral behavior. Interpretation of the funeral in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Sheikh Al-Nabulsi said that the funeral may indicate a person’s agreement to repent or perish in the wrong hands. And whoever dreams that no one carries him to his funeral, then this is his imprisonment. And whoever sees People cry at his funeral, for it is good, God willing, and its outcome will be good. Likewise, whoever sees people praying to him, praising him, and mentioning his good deeds at the funeral. On the contrary, blaming in a dream, the funeral in a dream may be a farewell to the traveler. Read also: Cutting hair in a dream for a woman. Interpretation of funerals in Ibn Shaheen’s dream: As for seeing a funeral procession flying in a dream, this means the death of a great person. As for the coffin that walks on the ground in a dream without being a carrier, it indicates a man’s travel, the marriage of unmarried women, and the corruption of the husband’s religion for a married woman. Whoever says: I dreamed of my funeral and no one was there. This indicates that his status has changed from honor to humiliation. As for the one who is seen performing the funeral, he is responsible for the marriage or marriage, and carrying the coffin in a dream may indicate that the seeker intercedes for those who do not intercede. And God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of walking behind a funeral in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabul: Someone who sees himself walking in his funeral and then submits to the oppressor or to the corrupt authority. The funeral in a dream arrives at the cemetery, and if the cemetery is known, then this vision indicates that the truth has returned to its owner. If it is hidden and ambiguous, then the wearer of the niqab is an unambiguous mystery, and if the woman is known, the interpretation goes back to her care. Sheikh Al-Nabulsi adds that a funeral in a dream can indicate money that is not permissible. Interpretation of walking in the funeral of an unknown dead person in a dream: It is clear that the dreamer is exercising his right, and whoever sees that he is going to a funeral has not given up his right. Seeing the funeral of a father or mother in a dream means integrity and following the position of one’s parents. . As for going to his son’s funeral, the dreamer does not raise him. The scene of going to a large funeral is a sign of a worthy funeral for a man. Seeing yourself walking around a small funeral in a dream indicates the funeral of an unknown man who does not care about the floor. The interpretation of walking at the beginning of the funeral indicates a love of drums and blowing trumpets. We explain that we We see a coffin in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. It indicates money, power, and prestige for the dreamer who carries a coffin in a dream, because the main principle of a coffin is refreshments. Sheikh Al-Nabulsi says that seeing a coffin in a dream means

And whoever dreams that no one carries him to his funeral, then this is his imprisonment. And whoever sees People cry at his funeral, for it is good, God willing, and its outcome will be good. Likewise, whoever sees people praying to him, praising him, and mentioning his good deeds at the funeral. On the contrary, blaming in a dream, the funeral in a dream may be a farewell to the traveler. Read also: Cutting hair in a dream for a woman. Interpretation of funerals in Ibn Shaheen’s dream: As for seeing a funeral procession flying in a dream, this means the death of a great person. As for the coffin that walks on the ground in a dream without being a carrier, it indicates a man’s travel, the marriage of unmarried women, and the corruption of the husband’s religion for a married woman. Whoever says: I dreamed of my funeral and no one was there. This indicates that his status has changed from honor to humiliation. As for the one who is seen performing the funeral, he is responsible for the marriage or marriage, and carrying the coffin in a dream may indicate that the seeker intercedes for those who do not intercede. And God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of walking behind a funeral in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabul: Someone who sees himself walking in his funeral and then submits to the oppressor or to the corrupt authority. The funeral in a dream arrives at the cemetery, and if the cemetery is known, then this vision indicates that the truth has returned to its owner. If it is hidden and ambiguous, then the wearer of the niqab is an unambiguous mystery, and if the woman is known, the interpretation goes back to her care. Sheikh Al-Nabulsi adds that a funeral in a dream can indicate money that is not permissible. Interpretation of walking in the funeral of an unknown dead person in a dream: It is clear that the dreamer is exercising his right, and whoever sees that he is going to a funeral has not given up his right. Seeing the funeral of a father or mother in a dream means integrity and following the position of one’s parents. . As for going to his son’s funeral, the dreamer does not raise him. The scene of going to a large funeral is a sign of a worthy funeral for a man. Seeing yourself walking around a small funeral in a dream indicates the funeral of an unknown man who does not care about the floor. The interpretation of walking at the beginning of the funeral indicates a love of drums and blowing trumpets. We explain that we We see a coffin in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. It indicates money, power, and prestige for the dreamer who carries a coffin in a dream, because the main principle of a coffin is refreshments.
